replies.msg:
公開試黎講 HNO3分三個層次：very dilute/dilute/conc

very dilute HNO3 -> 當普通acid
+Zn -> H2
+Cu -> no reaction

dilute HNO3 -> oxidizing agent
+Zn -> NO
+Cu -> NO
NO then oxidize by air to give NO2 (brown gas)
2NO + O2 -> 2NO2

conc HNO3 -> strong oxidizing agent
+Zn -> NO2
+Cu -> NO2
